reviewText: I am 56 years old. I love all the Core Rythmns dvds. The Sexy Abs video left me sweating. I found myself standing straighter and being more aware of my core throughout the day! I suppose its because the ab work is done while standing, not on the floor. Most of all it was fun and I'm sore. The Lower Body Sculpt and Sexy Abs is all low impact which is great when you're older and have wierd knees. The cardio video is fun, but like the other Core Rythmns I can't do the higher impact moves. I am a teacher- Janna and Julia are great instructors! A teacher knows a good teacher!
Title: N/A

reviewText: Worth it just for the Secret to Sexy Abs!!!I think I have all of the Core Rhythms DVDs and really enjoy them.  This set was different.  At no point are the two teachers together.  I really liked the Lower Body Toning as well, but the Secret to Sexy Abs made the entire purchase worth it.  Felt it everywhere!!!  Since I only paid a penny plus shipping for this I am beyond satisfied!
summary: Worth it just for The Secret to Sexy Abs!!!
Title: N/A

reviewText: I bought these dvd's to compliment my other Core R. dvd's and I'm glad I did.  Their are 3 dvd's in this collection. Sorry I can't give you the exact minutes of each dvd, but I forgot to look for the exact times when I finished working out and I don't have time now. So I'm going to do the best I can to guess.  The Lower Body Sculpt is about 20-25 minutes, and will definitely sculpt your lower body if you keep doing it long enough.  One workout had my muscles sore all the way into the next day and it wasn't even that long.  The Secret to Sexy Abs is about 20-30 minutes and when you do this tape you probably wont feel the soreness right away, but you'll definitely feel it the next day and perhaps the next day after that.  I know I did; it felt like I did 50-100 crunches and oblique situps or something.  The bonus Abs in a Hurry is about 5-7 minutes and it's on the same dvd as the Secret to Sexy Abs.  It may be only 5 or so minutes but it definitely gives your abs the workout it needs to get fit and toned.  The Latin Cardio Jam workout is about 20-40 minutes and it workes your whole entire body.  Once you're done, you'll feel the workout throughout your whole body.  As you can see I love these Core Rhythm dvd's and will continue to use them until I love how my body looks.  Take a chance and if you don't like them you can always send them back, but if you do like them you might just be one step closer to your goal.  I know I am.
Title: N/A

reviewText: OMG, there is a quick ab routine and a 30 minute routine. I have the original Core Rhythms Set but this set caught my eye because of the specific ab routines! I am TELLING you t get this set asap ya'll! I did the 30 minute ab section for a week and I could see the definition coming in my abs AND my Oblique area had visibly gone in (the side ab area). I bought my set here on Amazon and literally only paid for shipping because the set was priced at ONE PENNY!!! I LOVE it! I have over 200 Fitness Dvd's and about 20 of those are for the Abs...this is BY FAR the quickest that I have ever seen results. I am not a thin girl, about 180 and I carry most of my weight below my waist. I don't have a lot of fat in the ab area but there is some. I definitely need to loose some inches there and toning my abs has always been a goal that I have never reached. I am for CERTAIN that this 30 minute ab routine will do the job! I am sooo happy that I made this purchase!
summary: The 30 Minute Ab Section ALONE was worth my purchase!!!
